Quest_Info.Quest_Dialog: Completed when the player reaches the end of the map. (before he fights the boss). Starts as soon as tutorial is done.(in this case as soon as the game starts). Press 'Enter or A' to add quest
You have gotten gotten out of the forest. Press 'Enter or A' to continue
Completed when the player kills all (10) zombies. Starts once the player finds the survivors. Then talks to one of them. Press 'Enter or A' to add quest
You killed enough zombies.Press 'Enter or A' to continue
Completed when the player finds the shelter that, all the survivors are in. Starts once player enters the city. (after defeating the first boss).Press 'Enter or A' to add quest
You found everybody!. Press 'Enter or A' to continue
Completed when the player walks into the hospital. Starts once the player talks to leader of the survivors.Press 'Enter or A' to add quest
You found the hospital!. Press 'Enter or A' to continue
Completed when the player Kills the second boss.Then grabs the medicine. Starts once the player walks into the hospital.Press 'Enter or A' to add quest
You got the medicine!. Press 'Enter or A' to continue
